Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Bishop
    Bishop Class Extension of the ChessPiece Class, Inherits several methods, and overrides the possibleMoves() method twice.
    BlueCircleComponent
    BlueCircleComponent Class extends the JComponent class Lays out transparent blue circles based on the possibilities of where the piece can move too
    ChessBoard
    ChessBoard Class This class holds the information of all the pieces on the current board, and any addition checks.
    ChessComponent
    Chess Component Class extension of the JComponent class This class will take charge of drawing the chess pieces at their respective and appropriate location
    ChessFrame
    ChessFrame Class extends the JFrame Class This class will handle the design layout, appearance, and behind the scene mechanics of the chess game.
    ChessPiece
    ChessPiece Class The super class of all the chess pieces.
    Clock
    Clock Class (Not yet Implemented) Clock will serve as a timer for each player.
    Coordinate
    Coordinate Class This class will implement the interface class Comparable.
    King
    King Class Extension of the ChessPiece Class, Inherits several methods, and overrides the possibleMoves() method twice.

    Knight Class Extension of the ChessPiece Class, Inherits several methods, and overrides the possibleMoves() method twice.
    Pawn
    Pawn Class Extension of the ChessPiece Class, Inherits several methods, and overrides the possibleMoves() method twice.
    Player
    Player class This class will generate the basic information for each player.
    ProjectViewer
    Project Viewer Class Main Class to compile and run the Chess game

    Queen Class Extension of the ChessPiece Class, Inherits several methods, and overrides the possibleMoves() method twice.

    Rook Class Extension of the ChessPiece Class, Inherits several methods, and overrides the possibleMoves() method twice.
